title: Regulation No 765/67/EEC of the Commission of 26 October 1967 on the non-fixing of an additional amount for Australian eggs
header:
REGULATION No 765/67/EEC OF THE COMMISSION  of 26 October 1967  on the non-fixing of an additional amount for Australian eggs
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The levies fixed in accordance with Article 4 of Regulation No 122/67/EEC shall not be increased by (1) OJ No 117, 19.6.1967, p. 2293/67. (2) OJ No 129, 28.6.1967, p. 2577/67.  an additional amount in respect of imports of poultry eggs in shell, fresh or preserved, other than eggs for hatching, falling within sub-heading No ex 04.05 of the Common Customs Tariff originating in and coming from the Commonwealth of Australia.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 October 1967.
For the Commission
The President
Jean REY
